constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 84 (Friday, May 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KUSTER:
H.R. 3251.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution, the Taxing and Spending Clause: ``The Congress
shall have Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts
and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide for the common
Defense and general Welfare of the United States . . . ''
[Page H2357]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: BTU Act of 2021
